title: Is this Laptop alright for LOL?
body:
Acer Aspire E5-523G-90QW 15.6" Notebook


SPECS:

AMD A9-9410 (Dual Core up to 2.9GHz, 1MB Cache) Processor

15.6" WXGA Acer Cinecrystal™ LED LCD Display 

8GB DDR3 (1 x 8GB) RAM

1 TB Hard Disk Drive 

2GB AMD Radeon™ R5 M430 Dedicated Graphics

DVD-Super Multi Drive

802.11ac + BT

HD Camera

4-cell battery

SD card reader

2 x USB 3.0 Ports ( 1 with power-off charging) 

1 x USB 2.0 Port

1 x HDMI 

1 x VGA

Windows 10 Home

replies.body:
I have the same notebook

It can run league at a medium low, low being the best
What about runescape? I want to play runescape in the background and what not.

Thanks everyone, I am in QLD AUS. Looking for a Laptop under $1000 to play league of legends and Runescape on...Hopefully at the same time ;)

I would appreciate it if you guys could help me find a sutable laptop as I do not have a Clue what I'm looking at haha

Cheers :)

Trust me, if I could run League on a garbage laptop from the early 2000s (so bad that even MS Word would cause it to overheat, and updates took several hours) on medium-low, then basically any laptop can run League (especially now with low-spec mode). Granted, I had about 15 FPS and the overheating caused my normal ping to go from 35 ms to 900 - 1,500 ms, but I could still play.

I believe the specs were:
1 GHz CPU
The olden-day version of Integrated Graphics
1GB RAM
250 GB Memory
Eh, not the best, should run League at a moderate level I say
The real question is, does it come with a usb mouse?
Should be able to run fine on at least medium-low, if not, low.
